mapper.sql: id, sender, receiver_id as receiverId, receiver_name AS receiverName, power_id AS powerId, begin_time AS beginTime, end_time AS endTime, create_time AS createTime, update_time AS updateTime, create_user AS createUser, update_user AS updateUser
mapper.select: select t.id as id, s.`NAME_` as `name`, receiver_id as receiverId, s.processKey as powerId, begin_time as beginTime, end_time as endTime, t.receiver_name as receiverName from (select substring_index(f.ID_, ":", 1) as processKey, f.NAME_ from ACT_RE_PROCDEF f, (SELECT max(VERSION_) AS max_version, key_ AS key_ FROM ACT_RE_PROCDEF WHERE key_ IN (SELECT key_ FROM ACT_RE_PROCDEF) GROUP BY key_) a where VERSION_ = a.max_version AND f.key_ = a.key_ AND f.KEY_ NOT IN ('process201804161617') ) s left join t_user_entrust t on s.processKey = substring_index(t.power_id, ":", 1) and t.sender = #{userId} group by s.processKey order by t.create_time desc

select t.id as id, s.`name` as `name`, t.receiver_id as receiverId, s.code as powerId, t.begin_time as beginTime, t.end_time as endTime, t.receiver_name as receiverName from t_process_entrust as s left join t_user_entrust t on s.code = substring_index(t.power_id, ":", 1) and t.sender = #{userId} where s.is_del = 0 group by s.code

select t.id as id, u.user_name as `name`, t.sender as sender, t.receiver_id as receiverId, t.power_id as powerId, t.begin_time as beginTime, t.end_time as endTime, t.receiver_name as receiverName, t.create_time as createTime from t_user_entrust as t left join t_user u on t.sender = u.id where 1 = 1
and (t.sender = #{userId} or t.receiver_id = #{userId})
order by t.create_time desc
